Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to see if {!Account.Name} would be interested in sponsoring Compliance Week' upcoming Annual European event in Amsterdam. See below for the details.
Compliance Week Europe 2017 will be held at the Amsterdam Marriott on November 13-14, 2017. The event has one mission: to help compliance, audit, legal, and risk executives understand how they can build and manage their ethics & compliance programs more effectively. The sessions include keynote presentations by government regulators, panel discussions with fellow corporate compliance officers and small workshops where attendees can discuss issues in an intimate boardroom style setting. Attending the event will be 125-150 corporate legal, financial, audit, risk & compliance executives at global public companies.
The event website is events.complianceweek.com/cwe.
Topics discussed at the event include
Internal investigations Building and testing systems of internal control Whistleblower hotlines, and how to encourage their use Privacy and cyber-security Financial reporting Cooperating with regulatory authorities Effective compliance training programs Building compliance programs in emerging markets Working with boards or audit committees
The sponsorship package:
Presenting Sponsorship: 18,400
Leadership of one large-room session: Sponsor will work closely with Compliance Week team to ensure the session is consistent with others, and appropriately addresses agenda topics
Small room discussion: Leadership of a boardroom style conversation (up to 15 attendees)
Attendee list: Complete list of all attendeesâ€™ email and postal address information post event
Booth space: 6 foot table (1.8M), power cord, event Wi-Fi, 2 chairs and a trash bin
Media exposure: Sponsors receive prominent exposure (logo/branding/signage) on all event promotion and in venue signage
Passes: Four conference registrations
Attached are additional details. Please let me know if you have questions or need anything else. Thanks for your consideration.
